meanings.sent1: Her testiness showed when she snapped at her friend for no reason.
meanings.sent2: His testiness often led to arguments with his coworkers.
meanings.sent3: Despite her testiness, she always apologized afterwards.
meanings.sent4: The testiness in the room was palpable, making everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent5: The testiness in her voice made it clear she was not in the mood to talk.

meanings.definition: Tendency to become easily annoyed or angered
meanings.sent1: The testiness in his tone indicated he was close to losing his temper.
meanings.sent2: She tried to control her testiness, but sometimes it got the best of her.
meanings.sent3: His testiness towards the situation was comical, considering how trivial it was.
meanings.sent4: The testiness in the air was like a storm brewing, ready to explode at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The testiness in his eyes was a warning sign to tread carefully around him.
